import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Radio, Grid} from '@material-ui/core'; import { ethers } from 'ethers'; import './exchange.css'; import '../../bootstrap.min.css'; export default function Spot() { const [balance,setBalance]=useState(0); const [balance1,setBalance1]=useState(0); const [balance2,setBalance2]=useState(0); return (
YOUR BALANCE
Available BNB balance: {balance1}
Available USDT balance: {balance2}
Available MBT balance: {balance}
{/*
800?{paddingLeft:"30px", paddingRight: "30px"}:{paddingRight: "10px", paddingLeft: "10px"}}>
Swap {connectFlag?`Metamask Connected`:`Please connect metamask`}
*/}
); }
